packages.name: iOS Microsoft Word
packages.releaseNotes: • Cloud Create now available on Office for iOS: Cloud Create automatically saves every new file to the cloud from the moment you start, giving you all the benefits of cloud storage without any extra steps.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Excel
packages.releaseNotes:
• Comment previews on protected files: Excel now lets you preview comments on protected files directly from your email notifications. When someone adds a comment, the email includes the comment text and its context within the file, so you can quickly review feedback without unlocking or opening the document.
• Cloud Create now available on Office for iOS: Cloud Create automatically saves every new file to the cloud from the moment you start, giving you all the benefits of cloud storage without any extra steps.

packages.releaseNotes: • Cloud Create now available on Office for iOS: Cloud Create automatically saves every new file to the cloud from the moment you start, giving you all the benefits of cloud storage without any extra steps.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Outlook
packages.releaseNotes:
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft OneNote
packages.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.

Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience. 
 
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app (OneNote->Settings->Send Feedback) 
Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

packages.name: iOS Microsoft OneDrive
packages.releaseNotes:
We’ve been busy behind the scenes making OneDrive even better. Here’s what’s new and improved:

New

- Update album covers: Personalize your photo albums by choosing the perfect cover image.
- Sync status in settings: Quickly check your sync status right from account settings — no more guessing.

Fixed & Improved

We’ve made a number of behind-the-scenes improvements to keep things running smoothly:
- Drag and drop and sort by date: Enhanced drag-and-drop experience and made sort by date consistent across all environments.
- Gallery and albums: Updated empty state when filtering to the Pictures folder and fixed various album UI bugs.
- Live photos: Resolved playback issues and download errors for a smoother experience.
- Folder picker: Improved default selection, fixed crashes, and enhanced folder creation flows.
- Error handling: Clearer alerts when moving files with duplicate names or to read-only folders.
- Uploads and sync: Fixed manual photo upload failures, refreshed service endpoints, and enabled Vroom multiformat uploader for OneDrive Business.
- Shared with me and vault: Fixed vault sync root issues.
- General performance and stability improvements across the app.

Thanks for using OneDrive! We’re always working to improve your experience. If you run into any issues, just shake your device and tap “Send Feedback.“

/** These notes were generated using Copilot

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Windows App Mobile
packages.releaseNotes:
In this release we made the following updates:

• Improved connection success when NetBIOS-based name lookup is used for direct PC connections.
• Added support for updated safe area insets on iPhone 17 devices.
• Improved external display support for iPad Pro M5 and iPad Air M3 devices.
• Resolved deadlocks that occurred during account sign-out and workspace refresh.
• Added floating keyboard support on iPadOS 26.
• Addressed a number of crashes that were showing up in error reporting.

If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Settings > Submit Feedback.

Introducing the New Copilot: Your AI Companion
This update includes an intuitive design with more digestible and faster answers, plus new features.
Copilot Voice: Perfect for brainstorming, quick questions, or just venting.
Copilot Daily: Start your day with a news and weather summary. Clean, simple, and easy to digest.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Whiteboard
packages.releaseNotes:
Thanks everyone for using Whiteboard. Here's what's new in this version:) Please keep the feedback coming y'all! Enjoy.

CHANGELOG
* Adds daily drawing prompts to inspire creativity every day
* Generate unlimited drawing prompts with Creator Kit
* Usage and stability improvements


2.0 Additions and Improvements
* Introducing SharePlay drawing, draw with others over FaceTime or Messages.
* Introducing CreatorKit, get the most out of Whiteboard and support Indie development
* Now you can zoom in and out on drawings and images!
* Scroll around in freedom on the all new, expansive, drawing board.
* Autorotate from portrait to landscape and back, or you can choose to lock orientation.
* Drawing library, open and continue working on your recent drawings.
* Add new drawing button, create a new drawing anytime. 
* Significant performance and stability improvements
* Adds lock for drawing board zoom/pan/scroll
* Many more excited things are coming
* Stay tuned

- Jim

Issues, questions or suggestions?
• jim@getwhiteboard.com

Like Whiteboard?
• Please subscribe to CreatorKit to help support development
• Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it
• Please share Whiteboard with a friend or family member to help get the word out.
• Please email me jim@getwhiteboard.com and let me know how you're using Whiteboard, send me drawings, questions, concerns and feedback.
• Please subscribe to my Youtube channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSr7ecHz6AnGvbGJNJSODbw
• Please send me your Whiteboard drawings on Instagram @getwhiteboard.

packages.name: iOS Microsoft Edge AI Browser
packages.releaseNotes:
Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Here’s what’s new in this release:
• Ask Copilot from the page context menu: now you can get help even faster. Just long-press any text on a webpage and tap Ask Copilot to get instant insights.
• Copilot multi-tab context: ask questions across multiple tabs. Copilot now understands the context from all your open pages.
• Smarter suggestion chips: get more relevant and helpful suggestions based on what you’re browsing.
Upgrade now for a smarter, faster, and more productive Microsoft Edge!
